# Gradients & Fills Learn how to create and apply gradients and fill styles to your graphics. ## Linear Gradients `draw canvas [ fill linear 0 0 200 0 red orange yellow box 0 0 200 100 ]` ## Radial Gradients `draw canvas [ fill radial 100 100 100 white blue circle 100 100 100 ]` ## Solid Fills `draw canvas [ fill red circle 100 100 50 ]` ## Gradient Parameters - **Linear**: x1 y1 x2 y2 color1 color2 ... - **Radial**: x y r color1 color2 ... ## See Also - [Colors](/wiki/graphics/colors/) - Color reference - [Primitives](/wiki/graphics/drawing/primitives/) - Drawing primitives
